text: Shu'ayb skazal: "O moy narod! Vy by podumali: ved' koli mne darovano Gospodom moim yasnoye dokazatel'stvo, koli On daroval mne prekrasnuyu dolyu [, to kak mne oslushat'sya Yego]? Ne prerekat'sya s vami o tom, chto ya vam zapreshchayu, khochu ya, a lish' ispravleniya [vashikh deyaniy], naskol'ko eto v moikh silakh. Spospeshestvovat' mne v etom mozhet tol'ko Allakh. Na Nego ya upovayu, k Nemu obrashchayus'
